text:
手軽にNAT越え出来るので愛用させてもらってる > tailscale
softetherと違ってServer別途建てる必要ないのも便利(VPN Gateあるっちゃあるけど)

<https://tailscale.com/|https://tailscale.com/>
これで自宅鯖もクラウド化できる？

attachments.fallback: Tailscale: Best VPN Service for Secure Networks - Tailscale
attachments.title: Best VPN Service for Secure Networks - Tailscale
attachments.text: Tailscale is a zero config VPN for building secure networks. Install on any device in minutes. Remote access from any network or physical location.
